mapper.insert: insert into member(mid, mname, mpassword, memail, moriginalfilename, msavedfilename, mfiletype) values (#{mid}, #{mname}, #{mpassword}, #{memail}, #{moriginalfileName}, #{msavedfileName}, #{mfileType});
mapper.select: select mid, mname, mpassword, moriginalfilename, msavedfilename, mfiletype from member where mid=#{mid}
